text:
What about #clinicaltrials for #cannabis and #cancer?

There is a lot of anecdotal evidence that cannabis helps #fightcancer, but hard data from clinical trials is still catching up

Take a look at what's been found so far: https://t.co/NpwFu52U7j

@JAMAOnc #glioblastoma #THC https://t.co/AMnVihhn6v
